attributes.action: prevent members of the public raising pointless petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe e-government should be about devolution of true democratic power back the rightful onwers, the British public. So citizens from from Tooting Broadway to the the Outer Hebrides, Join in democracy now, make your voice heard. Power to the people!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
